effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.legends_za: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.mega_dimension: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
